text: Zusidava sinuosa is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Frederic Moore in 1888. It is found in the Khasi Hills of India. The Global Lepidoptera Names Index has this name as a synonym of Zusidava tortricaria. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1888 Category:Drepaninae Category:Moths of India Category:Taxa named by Frederic Moore
title: Zusidava sinuosa
